unnormalised: AIIMS Delhi saw a spike in patients complaining of "exam fever" on 15/03/2024, with most cases miraculously cured by 17/03/2024. Symptoms included excessive chai consumption (5+ cups/day), sleeplessness, and the delusion that 1 night of studying could make up for 365 days of Netflix.
normalised: A-I-I-M-S Delhi saw a spike in patients complaining of "exam fever" on fifteenth march two thousand and twenty four, with most cases miraculously cured by seventeenth march two thousand and twenty four. Symptoms included excessive chai consumption (five plus cups per day), sleeplessness, and the delusion that one night of studying could make up for three hundred and sixty five days of Netflix.

unnormalised: Dr. Sharma, Head of Emergency, joked that he's prescribing a compulsory "chill-pill" (a.k.a. forced Bollywood dance party) for all future cases. The ER was apparently overflowing with students lamenting "syllabus out of control!" and needing immediate intervention (read: parental pep talks).
normalised: Doctor Sharma, Head of Emergency, joked that he's prescribing a compulsory "chill-pill" (a.k.a. forced Bollywood dance party) for all future cases. The E-R was apparently overflowing with students lamenting "syllabus out of control!" and needing immediate intervention (read: parental pep talks).

unnormalised: One particularly amusing case involved a student who tried to self-medicate with 1000mg of caffeine and ended up requiring actual medical attention. Apparently, "coffee IV drip" isn't yet a recognized treatment protocol. We're thinking of adding it to the next AIIMS guidelines, maybe?
normalised: One particularly amusing case involved a student who tried to self-medicate with one thousand milligram of caffeine and ended up requiring actual medical attention. Apparently, "coffee I-V drip" isn't yet a recognized treatment protocol. We're thinking of adding it to the next A-I-I-M-S guidelines, maybe?

unnormalised: Bottom line: if you're feeling exam pressure, remember to breathe, folks! And maybe stick to 2 cups of coffee max. Your heart (and Dr. Sharma) will thank you. P.S. AIIMS doesn't actually have chill-pills. Yet.
normalised: Bottom line: if you're feeling exam pressure, remember to breathe, folks! And maybe stick to two cups of coffee max. Your heart (and Doctor Sharma) will thank you. P-S. A-I-I-M-S doesn't actually have chill-pills. Yet.
